item.title: Trump Administration Pushes Asylum Seekers to Apply in Other Countries
item.description: In immigration courts, U.S. lawyers have filed thousands of requests to dismiss asylum cases and force people to pursue asylum elsewhere.

item.title: Nuno Loureiro, Slain MIT Professor, Was a ‘Brilliant Scientist’
item.description: Nuno Loureiro, 47, was killed by an old classmate who was on the run from a shooting at Brown University, the authorities said.

item.title: Koch Political Operation Spent Nearly $550 Million During 2024 Cycle
item.description: The huge sum shows that while the Koch network may not hold significant power at high levels of the Republican Party, it remains a financial juggernau...

item.title: How Democrats Used One Word to Turn the Tide Against Trump
item.description: Both parties are now preparing for “affordability” to play a major role in the midterm elections next year. How did it emerge so quickly?

item.title: Why Middle-Class Americans Say Life Is Unaffordable
item.description: Economists say that a typical middle-class family today is richer than one in the 1960s. Americans in their 20s and 30s don’t believe it.
